Commands.Solid Barrel: 4-hit melee BRV attackSelf: 5 turns INT BRV Up II1 additional BRV attack when BRV is less than 250% of INT BRV
Commands.Renzokuken: 3-hit melee BRV attack + HP attack3 additional BRV attacks when BRV is less than 250% of INT BRV
Commands.Assault Trigger: 8-hit melee BRV attack + HP attackSelf: 5 turns Lion Heart I

Artifacts.Low BRV Attack Up: Raises Attack by 5% when BRV is under Initial BRV.
Artifacts.BRV Guard Up: Raises Defense Power by 10% when BRV is over 50% Max BRV.
Artifacts.Mighty Solid Barrel: Raises BRV Damage dealt by Solid Barrel by 10%.
Artifacts.Mighty Renzokuken: Raises BRV Damage dealt by Renzokuken by 10%.

Passives.Critical Power: Slightly raises BRV damage dealt with critical hits.
Passives.Solid Barrel Power: Slightly raises BRV damage dealt with Solid Barrel.
Passives.Chase Bonus: Slightly raises BRV damage during a Chase Sequence.
Passives.Solid Barrel Light: Slightly reduces action delay after using Solid Barrel.
Passives.Renzokuken Power: Slightly raises BRV damage dealt with Renzokuken.
Passives.Solid Barrel Charge: Increases the max uses of Solid Barrel by 1.
Passives.BRV Danger Speed Up: Slightly raises Speed when BRV is below Initial BRV.
Passives.Renzokuken Charge: Increases the max uses of Renzokuken by 1.
Passives.A Lion's Pride: Slightly raises Attack when BRV is lower than Initial BRV.
Passives.Buffed Attack Boost Up: Moderately raises MAX BRV, ATK with active buffs
Passives.Solid Barrel Extension: Solid Barrel use +1When using Solid Barrel: Slight BRV damage boostWhen using Solid Barrel+: Moderate BRV damage boost Last hit becomes group attack Triggers additional HP attack if BRV is at least 80% of MAX after last hit
Passives.High Speed Buff: Largely raises SPD with active buffs
Passives.Renzokuken Extension: Renzokuken use +1When using Renzokuken: Slight BRV damage boostWhen using Renzokuken+: Moderate BRV damage boost 50% HP damage dealt to non-targets

Weapons.Twin Lance CP: 15: Increases the potency of Solid Barrel.
Weapons.Cutting Trigger CP: 35: Increases Renzokuken's potency and lowers its action delay.Grants Small Max BRV Up and Small Attack Up for 5 turns.
Weapons.Shear Trigger CP: 70: May equip the EX Ability Assault Trigger.
Weapons.Sol Blade CP: 15: Slightly raises Initial BRV and Max BRV when HP is over 80%.
